thread.title: Bill
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Bill

author: Bill
title: Bill
text:
They have a fabulous selection of puzzles and free freight deals so I stock up even when I have plenty in inventory.
I would like the puzzles to be just a tad thicker.
I sent them a note about an idea I had for them as a company (not the thicker pieces) but I received no response.
Oh well.
